Errors.Mandatory: Name is a mandatory field.
Errors.Char Atleast Should Be: Name field should be atleast 4 characters long
Errors.Charater Less Then Value: Name field will allow 63 characters or less.

Errors.Mandatory: Group is a mandatory field.
Trust Level is a mandatory field.
Errors.Numbers Only: Trust Level value can only be numbers.
Errors.Trust Level values range: Trust Level values range from 0 to 7, where 0 is lowest level of security whereas 7 is highest level of security.

Errors.Mandatory: Priority is a mandatory field.
IP Address is a mandatory field.
Errors.Enter Ip or Mac Address: Error: Must enter an IP address or MAC address.
Errors.Invalid Prefix 48 through 128: Invalid IPv6 prefix value. Prefix should be an integer from 48 through 128.
Errors.Invalid Prefix 8 through 32: Invalid IPv4 prefix value. Prefix should be an integer from 8 through 32.

Message.Ip Address Description: IP address must be any one of the following:

List.Ipv4 Octet Section: Valid <0>IPv4 Address</0> such as <1>1.2.3.4</1> with just octet sections.
List.Ipv4 Prefix Range: Valid <0>IPv4 Address</0> with Prefix range between 8-32 such as <1>1.2.3.4/24</1>
List.Ipv6 Hextet Section: Valid <0>IPv6 Address</0> such as <1>2001:db8:3333::0:00FF:08</1> with just hextet sections.
List.Ipv6 Prefix Range: Valid <0>IPv6 Address</0> with prefix range between 48-128 such as <1>ff00::12ee/56</1>

Errors.Mandatory: MAC Address is a mandatory field.
Errors.Enter Ip or Mac Address: Error: Must enter an IP address or MAC address.

Errors.Comment allow 63 or less Char: Comment field will allow 63 characters or less.
Errors.Comment allow 1024 or less Char: Comment field will allow 1024 characters or less.

Errors.Mandatory: TCP Tagging is a mandatory field.
Remote Key field is a mandatory field.
Enabled field is a mandatory field.
UDP field is a mandatory field.
IP Address/Prefix is a mandatory field.
Errors.Invalid Prefix 48 and 128: Invalid IPv6 prefix value. Prefix should be an integer between 48 and 128.
Errors.Invalid Prefix 8 through 32: Invalid IPv4 prefix value. Prefix should be an integer from 8 through 32.

Errors.Mandatory: Atleast one protected resource need to be selected.
Errors.Resources Not Exceed: Resources list can not exceed more than 8 protected resources

Errors.Mandatory: Action field is mandatory.
Protected resource(s) is a mandatory field.
Group(s) is a mandatory field.
Errors.Invalid: Group(s) field can not contain any special characters.

Errors.Mandatory: Protocol is a mandatory field.
All Identity Groups field is not selected.
vLAN ID must contain only digits. It may be left empty.
Errors.Vaild Number Between: vLAN ID must be a valid number between 0 and 4095.

Errors.Mandatory: Port Name is a mandatory field
Number is a mandatory field.
Errors.Only Number: Value in Number field is not correct.
Errors.Range: Number field should be in the range 0-1020.

Errors.Mandatory: Source IP is a mandatory field.
Errors.Invalid Prefix 48 and 128: Invalid IPv6 prefix value. Prefix should be an integer between 48 and 128.
Errors.Invalid Prefix 8 through 32: Invalid IPv4 prefix value. Prefix should be an integer from 8 through 32.

Errors.Range: Source Port field should be in the range of 1-65535.

Errors.Mandatory: Destination IP is a mandatory field.
Errors.Valid Prefix 48 through 128: Invalid IPv6 prefix value. Prefix should be an integer from 48 through 128.
Errors.Valid Prefix 8 through 32: Invalid IPv4 prefix value. Prefix should be an integer from 8 through 32.

Errors.Range: Destination Port field should be in the range of 1-65535.

Errors.Mandatory: Destination is a mandatory field.
Errors.Range: The destination can contain only a maximum of 7 host addresses

Errors.Mandatory: Action is a mandatory field.
Roles is a mandatory field.
Location is a mandatory field.
Certificate is a mandatory field.
Algorithm is a mandatory field.
Timeout is a mandatory field.
Errors.Invalid: Timeout value must be a valid number.
Errors.Range: Timeout value should range from 3600 to 65534 (seconds).

Errors.Mandatory: Heartbeat Interval is a mandatory field.
Errors.Invalid: Heartbeat Interval must be a valid number.
Errors.Range: Heartbeat Interval value should be less than half of Timeout value.

Errors.Mandatory: TAC Mutual Auth field is a mandatory field.

Errors.Expired In Days: Invisipoint Certificate expires in {{ days }} days.

Errors.Mandatory: Trusted Flag is a mandatory field.

configureFilterRulesModal.title: Configure Filter Rules
configureFilterRulesModal.taskMessage1: The selected invisipoint already has a policy update task.
configureFilterRulesModal.taskMessage2: Please wait for it to complete before trying to configure/clear filter rule(s) for this invisipoint again.
configureFilterRulesModal.taskRequired: Please select at least one template (other than default template) to save and try again. To apply just the default filter rules, use clear filter rules.
configureFilterRulesModal.lmessage: Once linked, updating one input will update other inputs with same label.
configureFilterRulesModal.lmessage2: <0>P.S.:</0> Note that if inputs have different values at the time of linking, value of input whose link button is clicked will be applied to all.
configureFilterRulesModal.uMessage: Once unlinked, updating one input won't update other inputs with same label.
configureFilterRulesModal.successSaving: Filter rules configured successfully. The configure task has been queued and will complete shortly.
configureFilterRulesModal.errorSaving: Error configuring filter rules. Please try again.

configureFilterRulesModal.rangeSourcePort: Source Port should be in the range of 0 - 65535.
configureFilterRulesModal.rangeDestinationPort: Destination Port should be in the range of <0>0 - 65535</0>.

List.Ipv4 Prefix Range: Valid <0>IPv4 Address</0> with Prefix range between 8-32 such as <1>1.2.3.4/24</1>
List.Ipv6 Hextet Section: Valid <0>IPv6 Address</0> such as <1>2001:db8:3333::0:00FF:08</1> with just hextet sections.

haltGateway.title: Halt {{ console }}

confirm.text: Are you sure you want to Halt this {{ console }}?
confirm.description: The {{ console }} will be unreachable until {{ type }} restarted.

haltGateway.description: Halting the {{ console }} will cause it to shutdown and will no longer pass any traffic. The {{ console }} will need to be physically restarted to pass traffic again. If you would like to proceed please click the Halt {{ console }} button below.

rebootGateway.title: Reboot {{ console }}

confirm.text: Are you sure you want to Reboot this {{ console }}?
confirm.description: The {{ console }} will be unreachable until {{ type }} restarted.

rebootGateway.description: Rebooting the {{ console }} will cause the {{ console }} to temporarily not pass traffic until the restart has completed. If you would like to proceed please click the Reboot {{ console }} button below.
